what_you_do: Life coaching and speaking focused on helping people achieve better health, meaningful prosperity, deeper joy, and sustainable inner peace.
who_you_serve: People who feel burned out or unfulfilled despite outward success, seeking more clarity, meaning, and joy in life.
social_proof: 25 years working behind the scenes at NBC; known as 'The Happiness Architect'
